entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
